item.description:
Saturday May 15th (5.15) @ 10:00am, The Most Informal Running Club Ever will have a Special Host at a Special Location!!!

The Sports Club/LA! (click for club info)

That's right folks. For one day only The Most Informal Running Club Ever will have our Fun Run + BFAST Downtown.

Meet in the club (4th floor) before the run @ 10:00am. This way people can drop off their keys/bags.

The Sports Club/LA has offered to host and pamper TMIRCE runners for this event. What do I mean by pamper?


  • Runners will receive a complimentary 5-day pass to the club:
    Click this link to sign up for your pass!
    http://www.mpsportscl...
  • complimentary breakfast menu for runners in their cafe including: eggs, juices, bananas, apples, oranges, bagels, croissants and muffins.
  • Parking will be included for up to 3 hours for anyone who wants to drive in! Members should take a ticket at the parking garage that is located on Boylston St.
    BE SURE TO BRING THE TICKET UP TO THE CLUB SO IT CAN BE VALIDATED BEFORE YOU LEAVE


PLEASE RSVP SO WE CAN HAVE ENOUGH FOOD (IF YOU DON'T THE LLAMA WILL COME AFTER YOU)

~IMPORTANT DETAILS FUN RUN+BFAST (May 5.15)~

FUN RUN ROUTES:
2.6 Mi
http://www.gmap-pedom...

4.4 Mi
http://www.gmap-pedom...

4.4 Mi Alternative
http://www.gmap-pedom...

5.2 Mi
http://www.gmap-pedom...

*8.5 Mi SC/LA-TMIRCE Challenge*
http://www.gmap-pedom...

Location and Parking:
http://tinyurl.com/2e...

Meet in the club (4th floor) before the run @ 10:00am. This way people can drop off their keys/bags.

Getting there by the T:

  • Boylston T Stop (Green Line)
  • Park St. T Stop (Green Line)
  • Chinatown Station (Orange Line)
  • Bus: Tremont St Opp Avery St (0.07 miles)
    Route 15 Mattapan Via Dudley Fields Cor
    Route 39 Forest Hills Via South
    Route 57 Watertown Kenmore
    Route 43 Ruggles Sta Via Tremont St
    09:33 AM, 09:48 AM,
    Route 55 Queensberry St Via Copley Sta
    SL5 Dudley Sta Silver Line Sta
    09:39 AM, 09:47 AM, 09:55 AM


PLEASE RSVP SO WE CAN HAVE ENOUGH FOOD (IF YOU DON'T THE LLAMA WILL COME AFTER YOU)

It's on Facebook too!
http://www.facebook.c...

Direct any questions to me, Andy:
informalrunning@gmail.com

This will be the best run EVER!
Eat, Run and Be Merry
The Most Informal Running Club Ever aims to promote healthy living and community by uniting people through the simple act of running together.
informalrunning.com
tmirce.spreadshirt.com

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: The Sports Club/LA Hosts TMIRCE Downtown!
